name: Corvus Robotics
headline: Autonomous drones to help warehouses scan inventory.
description: Our software allows drones to fly indoors and collect analytics, helping warehouses automate inventory collection.
tags: industry:warehouse-management-tech; industry:robotics; industry:drones; industry:logistics; industry:supply-chain; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jonathan Sandau, Founder/Chief Software Architect
founders.description: Chief Software Architect at Corvus Robotics (S18)

# Fully automated inventory management.
We make the world's 1st unmanned warehouse inventory drones. They fly themselves to scan pallet labels on your racks, no human involved.
[Schedule a call](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/<https:/blog.corvus-robotics.com/contact-us>)
[ ![play video](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/icons/play.svg)](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
[ Watch full video ](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
Introducing revolutionary autonomy in supply chain solutions.
[ ![3pl](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/icons/3pl.svg) 3PLs Save on warehouse leases for seasonal rushes; save on labor costs for cycle count & putaway audits; win more bids with Corvus One warehouse drones. ](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</industries>)
[ ![manufacturing](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/icons/manufacturer.svg) Manufacturers Use our warehouse inventory analytics to prevent assembly line stoppages by finding and delivering all the parts you need quickly. ](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</industries#tab-manufacturing/>)
[ ![manufacturing](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/icons/retail.svg) Retail/Distributors Optimize your warehouse for seasonal rushes, and don't lose money due to stockouts by deploying our warehouse inventory drones. ](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</industries#tab-retail>)
[ ![accounting](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/icons/accounting.svg) Accounting/Consulting Win more bids with Corvus One inventory drones; drive efficiency in utilization and decrease your main cost driver with warehouse robots. ](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</industries#tab-accounting>)
Previous
![](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/slider-1.png)
Labor shortages are our new normal
Use warehouse inventory drones to help perform cycle counts. Get eyes on each bin daily, and find discrepancies when they happen instead of weeks after the fact.
[Learn More](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
[![drone warehouse](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/fly.gif)](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
![](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/slider-2.png)
Would you like robotics with that? Done!
Discover the world’s most intelligent inventory drones to support your existing facility or new facility opening. Find a custom solution for you.
[Learn More](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
[![corvus one warehouse inventory drone flying](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/drone-flying.png)](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
![](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/slider-1.png)
Manage supply chain disruptions
Corvus Robotics recommends a supply chain digital transformation strategy including autonomous warehouse drones, inventory software, and AI to track items and improve facility occupancy.
[Learn More](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
[![drone warehouse](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/assets/imgs/lp-in-warehouse.jpeg)](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)

##### Industry Software of the Future
Powerful software on the edge or on the cloud, to deliver analytics that help reduce your spend and allocate working capital. Send our drone into your warehouse and receive data back in real-time.
[Learn More](https://www.corvus-robotics.com/</corvus-one>)
#  What our US customers say 
"This represents a step change in how we do inventory."
Facility Manager One of the world's largest 3PLs
"What usually takes 3 months was reduced to under a week with the inventory drone. This could save us millions.
VP of Logistics Tier 1 US automotive supplier
"We spend more than this doing inventory already. I can see the enormous potential of deploying Corvus drones across our facilities."
CFO Blue-chip industrial manufacturer

generated_description:
Corvus Robotics, founded in 2017 and a proud Y Combinator Batch S18 participant, is making strides in the realm of warehouse automation with their innovative approach to inventory management. Based in Mountain View, California, and sporting a tight-knit team of 20, Corvus is on a mission to revolutionize how warehouses operate by harnessing the power of autonomous drones.

Their flagship product, the Corvus One, is designed to fly around warehouse facilities autonomously, scanning pallet labels with precision, and collecting real-time data. This means no human involvement during inventory checks, dramatically reducing labor costs and boosting efficiency—a game-changer for businesses dealing with the challenges of inventory management. 

In essence, Corvus Robotics is tackling some of the primary pain points in logistics and supply chain operations by providing robust drone solutions tailored for various industries including 3PL, manufacturing, retail, and accounting. Their technology allows companies to perform cycle counts daily, improving accuracy and responsiveness, which is particularly crucial in today's market where labor shortages are prevalent.

They’ve got a clear understanding of their value proposition: by automating inventory processes, businesses can save on warehouse leases, minimize human error, and ultimately enhance their bidding capacities in a competitive landscape. 

For those interested in this cutting-edge technology or looking to learn more, check out their website at [Corvus Robotics](https://www.corvus-robotics.com). Whether you’re a logistics professional or simply curious about where the future of warehouse management is headed, Corvus Robotics is a company to watch closely as they lead the way into an automated future.
